ha.. good to see this is still alive and in circulation.  Btw, the audio/video problem I mentioned in the description was a codec problem and nothing to do with the rip.  This rip is fine.
This is definitely NOT a comedy. This is a drama film and one of the best films i have ever seen.

Actually, XenOtai, you could not be more WRONG.  
It is definitely a comedy. It's what's called a dark comedy. 
If you didn't find this movie insanely hilarious enough to be able to  tell that it's obviously a comedy, then.... something is wrong with you.
Or with you, maybe?.. Everything is relative. And the more opinions the better!
